TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Table extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class Table Inherits WebControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Table : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler
type Table = class inherit WebControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 在 Web 網頁上顯示表格。

span.span: Displays a table on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項可讓您建置 HTML 表格，並指定其特性，以直接的方式。The control allows you to build an HTML table and specify its characteristics in a straightforward manner. 可以建立資料表，在設計階段提供部分靜態內容，但威力Web 伺服器控制項通常會發現當資料表是以程式設計方式建立動態內容。A table can be built at design time given some static content, but the power of a Web server control is often realized when the table is built programmatically with dynamic contents. > [!NOTE] > 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性設定為`3.5`，控制項呈現`border`屬性設定為"0"，在 HTML`table`項目。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the element in the Web.config file is set to `3.5`, the control renders a `border` attribute that is set to "0" on the HTML `table` element. 請務必記住，任何以程式設計方式新增或修改資料表的資料列或資料格將不會保存在張貼至伺服器。It is important to remember that any programmatic addition or modification of table rows or cells will not persist across posts to the server. 這是因為資料表的資料列和資料格控制項，其本身，而不是屬性的控制項。This is because table rows and cells are controls of their own, and not properties of the control. 若要保存至資料表的任何變更，資料列和資料格，必須重新建構之後每次回傳。To persist any changes to the table, rows and cells must be reconstructed after each postback. 事實上，如果大量修改預期，建議， ，或控制項來取代控制項。In fact, if substantial modifications are expected, it is recommended that a , , or control be used instead of the control. 如此一來，類別主要由控制項開發人員使用。As a result, the class is primarily used by control developers. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在設計階段建立資料表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table at design time. 此資料表包含兩個資料格的兩個資料列。The table contains two rows of two cells each. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建構資料表。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a table programmatically. 以動態方式建立資料表包含三個步驟。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，建立物件來代表資料列中的資料格。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 方法是加入儲存格的內容屬性或藉由將控制項加入的集合。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下來，建立來代表資料表中的資料列。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 新增先前建立的物件的集合。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最後，新增要的集合控制項。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 重複此程序的資料表中的每個資料列。Repeat this process for each row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在 控制項後方所顯示的背景影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image to display behind the control.

value.span: 控制項的背景影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在背景中顯示之影像的位置控制項。Use the property to specify the location of an image to display in the background of the control. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相對的 URL 與網頁或使用者控制項的位置之影像的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不需要更新程式碼中的映像的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 絕對 URL 會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要更新程式碼。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. > [!NOTE] > 如果映像小於控制項，它會並排顯示。If the image is smaller than the control, it will be tiled.

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 這個屬性可以讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.

value.span: 字串，表示要在 控制項的 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的資料表描述的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible. 額外的協助工具支援控制項由提供屬性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用屬性，以指定的 HTML 標題項目中的對齊方式控制項。Use the property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a control. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

span.span: Table, TableRow, and TableCell Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign
Public Overridable Property CaptionAlign As TableCaptionAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign value); };
member this.CaptionAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中 HTML 標題項目的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 這個屬性可以讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 這個屬性可以讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|標題項目與資料表底端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the left of the table.| |`Right`|標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the right of the table.| 額外的協助工具支援控制項由提供屬性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的型別不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

related.span: 資料表、 TableRow 和 TableCell Web 伺服器控制項概觀

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格控制項具有相同寬度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 以最寬的資料格套用的填補量和資料行中的所有儲存格有此儲存格的寬度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有儲存格有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 邊框距離會套用至資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有儲存格有此儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.

related.span: 資料表、 TableRow 和 TableCell Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: Table, TableRow, and TableCell Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 儲存格之間的間距數量，以像素為單位。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中相鄰儲存格之間的間距控制項。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the control. 此間距已套用垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 儲存格間距是統一整個資料表。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire table. 不能指定每個資料列或資料行之間的個別儲存格間距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定這個屬性的值大於 0 且組屬性值，這個值會顯示儲存格框線，間隔會顯示相鄰的資料格框線之間。If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情況下，屬性控制的差距大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap.

related.span: 資料表、 TableRow 和 TableCell Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the controls of the current control.

returns.span: 物件，包含目前 控制項的 控制項。

span.span: A object to contain the controls of the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂類別時，這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from a control. 這個方法會覆寫基底實作類別。This method overrides the implementation for the base class. 針對控制項中，一律會傳回只可包含控制項的目前控制項。For a control, the always returns a that can only contain controls of the current control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使它一律會傳回的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得定義 控制項外觀之屬性集合的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of a control.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 控制項內的格線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the grid line style to display in the control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定哪些資料格框線會顯示在控制項。Use the property to specify which cell borders are displayed in the control. 下表列出各種不同的格線線條樣式。The following table lists the different grid line styles. |格線值GridLine value|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |`None`|顯示沒有資料格框線。No cell borders are displayed.| |`Horizontal`|會顯示水平資料格框線。Only the horizontal cell borders are displayed.| |`Vertical`|會顯示垂直資料格框線。Only the vertical cell borders are displayed.| |`Both`|會顯示水平和垂直資料格框線。Both the horizontal and vertical cell borders are displayed.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定格線的線條樣式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the grid line style. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定頁面上 控制項的水平對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the control on the page.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的水平對齊頁面內的控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the control within the page. 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles. |HorizontalAlign 值HorizontalAlign value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|水平對齊尚未設定控制。The horizontal alignment of the control has not been set.| |`Left`|頁面上靠左對齊控制項。The control is left justified on the page.| |`Center`|控制項置於頁面。The control is centered on the page.| |`Right`|頁面上靠右對齊控制項。The control is right justified on the page.| |`Justify`|控制項與頁面的左邊和右邊邊界對齊。The control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/CS/custom_table_aligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/VB/custom_table_alignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項中的資料列集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of rows in the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中的 物件。

span.span: A that contains the objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，以程式設計方式管理中的物件控制項。Use the collection to programmatically manage the objects in the control. A表示資料表中的資料列。A represents a row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 只有在以程式設計方式建立資料表時，通常可以使用此屬性。This property is normally used only when building tables programmatically. 在設計階段，它由宣告設定物件的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。At design time, it is set by declaring objects between the opening and closing tags of the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來以程式設計方式建構資料表的集合。The following example demonstrates how use the collection to construct a table programmatically. 以動態方式建立資料表包含三個步驟。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，建立物件來代表資料列中的資料格。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 方法是加入儲存格的內容屬性或藉由將控制項加入的集合。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下來，建立來代表資料表中的資料列。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 新增先前建立的物件的集合。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最後，新增要的集合控制項。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 重複此程序的資料表中的每個資料列。Repeat this process for each row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到具有空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an. aspx 副檔名。aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法以引發事件，以供控制當表單張貼至伺服器時。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 這個方法是明確介面成員實作。This method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義的自訂實作，以引發的事件物件，覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法以引發事件時張貼的資料已變更的控制項。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.
